ygData.subject: Re: KABONG!  RE: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test
ygData.msgSnippet: OMG!  Is that right??  I saw a bard in there (well, all i could remember was it was a tavern in freeport - east i thought) and he had a sword and a lute! - I
ygData.messageBody:
OMG! Is that right?? I saw a bard in there (well, all i could remember was
it was a tavern in freeport - east i thought) and he had a sword and a
lute! - I even posted that just recently as a possible place to look! he
also had some dialog and kept saying he was going to sing/play but never
did. Possibly this is the link back to the one in Qeynos.

I wonder if they also fixed the "ask me later about a special bardic
weapon..." in Sol Ro.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Talies the Wanderer" <snicker@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 21, 2000 12:08 PM
Subject: KABONG! RE: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test

> Now, to encourage other threads... I heard a rumour today that Fabian was
> seen in the Grub'n'Grog in Freeport - any confirmations?
>
> Talies the Kabong'r
